_source.short_desc: Veloce POS systems are extremely reliable and fully tailored in order to maximize the efficiency and profitability of businesses.
_source.long_desc: For over 20 years, the Veloce team has been developing and refining its management systems to perfectly match its clients needs. Veloce exceeds competitors by delivering intelligent features and flawless reliability. System performance, engineering and flexibility are at the heart of Veloce's mission.
_source.target_audience: Veloce POS is perfect for any business who looking to optimize their efficiency and profitability with the most reliable point of sale (POS) system.

related_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
related_products.features:
When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. 
Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

related_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust scheduling, communication, and engagement tool built specifically for restaurants. Simplify your life. Start free!
related_products.features: 7shifts empowers restaurants of all sizes to trim labor costs, retain staff, and stay labor compliant with robust scheduling, communication, compliance, and engagement tools. 7shifts helps restaurant managers save 5 hours/week on scheduling, minimize call & text chaos with streamlined communication, manage staff on-the-go with free mobile apps, and trim labor costs up to 3% with integrated POS data. Join 700,000+ restaurants using 7shifts to simplify management. Start your free trial today!

related_products.short_desc: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues.
related_products.features: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues that will increase sales and streamline the booking process. It is the first web-based system created by hospitality event managers for hospitality event managers. Since 2008 Tripleseat has taken the restaurant business by storm providing solutions and simplifying the event process from start to finish. Over 2,500 venues and 18,000+ event industry expert trust Tripleseat.

related_products.short_desc: CAKE POS is designed to meet the unique needs of restaurants. A simple, intuitive and cost-friendly solution.
related_products.features:
CAKE built its POS to meet the demands of Quick & Full Service restaurants. It is simple, intuitive, and cost-friendly.

Easily handle Quick Service rush hours with line-busting OrderPads that control the flow of traffic and a customer-facing display for guests to privately pay, tip, and sign from their own screen. Supercharge your Full-Service POS with rich guest profiles and automatic table status updates. CAKE POS makes it easy for restaurants to get more done every day.

related_products.short_desc: HotSchedules reduces food and labor costs, time spent on administrative tasks, and operational complexity.
related_products.features: HotSchedules provides a cloud-based operating platform, as well as supporting solutions and services for the restaurant, retail and hospitality industries. HotSchedules suite of products enables owners and operators to schedule employees across locations, track time and attendance, monitor business performance and manage day-to-day operations. With HotSchedules native mobile app, employees can check schedules, pick-up and drop shifts, and request time off, all from their mobile phones.

related_products.short_desc: TouchBistro has been designed to meet the unique needs and specific demands of the restaurant industry.
related_products.features: TouchBistro is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system that makes running a restaurant easier. Built to meet the unique needs of the restaurant industry, TouchBistro is fast, reliable, and easy to use, and has all of the features restaurateurs need to increase sales, deliver a great guest experience, and save both time and money. By pairing innovative restaurant technology and dedication to customer support and success, TouchBistro has powered more than 29,000 restaurants globally!

related_products.short_desc: Simplify FOH busywork while growing your following with our high-intent network, so you can focus on the guest.
related_products.features: Yelp Guest Manager helps restaurants manage all of their front-of-house operations across the entire dining experience through one fully integrated solution - by bringing together Yelp Waitlist, Reservations, Kiosk, Takeout, Table Management, online brand building and more into one product. Yelp Guest Manager combines Yelp's high-intent diner network with powerful solutions that simplify and streamline restaurant operations from takeout and delivery orders to dine-in seating.

related_products.short_desc: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system built to improve efficiency and dramatically cut costs.
related_products.features: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system. Built specifically for foodservice, Toast is remarkably easy to use. Toast customers can easily fulfill orders, update online and in-house menus, and manage staff payroll. With online ordering, advanced real-time reporting and loyalty programs built in, Toast eliminates the need to juggle multiple vendors and dramatically cuts costs.

related_products.short_desc: Build the Restaurant of tomorrow, today. Evolve your business with the future of POS technology.
related_products.features:
Restaurant management for the future

Our Restaurant POS System will help you stay ahead in an evolving industry.

Easily connect to major ordering and delivery apps to create new revenue streams and meet customer expectations.

Track inventory, calculate costs and profit, simplify reordering and integrate with leading accounting software.

Leverage powerful sales reports on any device to boost profitability, reduce wastage and improve employee efficiency.

related_products.short_desc: POS for Restaurants, Bars and Cafes. Complete restaurant and bar management system.
related_products.features: Upserve by Lightspeed is an industry-leading POS used by thousands of restaurants that serves up insights daily. Specifically designed by restaurant people, Upserve by Lightspeed merges an easy-to-use interface with powerful POS features to modernize and streamline your restaurant operations: including Online Ordering, Contactless Payments, and Tableside Devices to boost profits and optimize your restaurant operations.

related_products.short_desc: Jolt is an app used to manage daily operations and hourly workers, giving real-time feedback to restaurant owners and managers.
related_products.features: Jolt is a tablet-based software used to manage daily operations for brands like Chick-fil-A, McDonald's, and Buffalo Wild Wings. Owners and managers get a real-time look at daily operations from their phone, and in-store tablets keep staff accountable and on task. Jolt includes a training library, drag-n-drop schedule builder, text notifications, a time clock, and more. Trusted in thousands of restaurants across the globe, Jolt has helped over 300,000 users complete over 700 million tasks.

similar_products.short_desc: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system built to improve efficiency and dramatically cut costs.
similar_products.features: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system. Built specifically for foodservice, Toast is remarkably easy to use. Toast customers can easily fulfill orders, update online and in-house menus, and manage staff payroll. With online ordering, advanced real-time reporting and loyalty programs built in, Toast eliminates the need to juggle multiple vendors and dramatically cuts costs.

similar_products.short_desc: Get an overview of your restaurant's food safety in seconds. Use the pre-filled monitoring checks. Switch to digital in 15 minutes.
similar_products.features:
AI-powered food safety management system for restaurants to serve and sell 100% safe food. Maintain your food safety with minimum effort. An automated setup enables you to go digital in 15 minutes.

Our app notifications help your team to remember all daily tasks. Save 20% of your time spent supervising and use automatically filled monitoring checks. The built-in HACCP builder creates you a HACCP plan in 1 hour that is customizable any time.

similar_products.short_desc: Square for Restaurants powers front and back of house operations for your full-service, quick-service, or fast-casual restaurant, bar
similar_products.features: The Square for Restaurants Point of Sale platform powers your speed and flexibility across front and back of house operations for your full-service restaurant, quick-service restaurant, fast-casual restaurant, bar or brewery. Handle online ordering, menus, table layouts, cover counts, coursing, payment processing, real-time reporting, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust scheduling, communication, and engagement tool built specifically for restaurants. Simplify your life. Start free!
similar_products.features: 7shifts empowers restaurants of all sizes to trim labor costs, retain staff, and stay labor compliant with robust scheduling, communication, compliance, and engagement tools. 7shifts helps restaurant managers save 5 hours/week on scheduling, minimize call & text chaos with streamlined communication, manage staff on-the-go with free mobile apps, and trim labor costs up to 3% with integrated POS data. Join 700,000+ restaurants using 7shifts to simplify management. Start your free trial today!

similar_products.short_desc: Join our 60 day program and we prove our worth is 10x what you pay. Just check our reviews.
similar_products.features: Restaurant Systems Pro will easily provide a multiple ROI. There is a risk free 60 Day program where we give you everything. Software that provides systems for the whole restaurant.  Connects to your POS system. Our 60 Day program gives you over $5k of consulting and services for $197. We put our money where our mouth is and prove we can get you a return on $5k of services for fraction of the costs.  RSP has multiple systems all connected and in one place. We will double your profits for $197.

similar_products.short_desc: Simphony POS is built for complete restaurant management for businesses of all backgrounds and sizes. Upgrade your POS hardware for $1.
similar_products.features: Oracle Simphony POS offers complete restaurant management. Our cloud-based POS connects every aspect of your operations so you can easily manage online orders, kitchen ops, inventory & menus, delivery, loyalty & more. Real-time analytics are included so you always have a pulse on sales, costs & staff performance. Simphony's open API & extensive cloud marketplace gives you unlimited scale. Upgrade your POS hardware for $1.

similar_products.short_desc: Get visually engaging digital menu boards on your TV screens in seconds and engage your customers. Upsell and cross-sell menu items.
similar_products.features: Yodeck makes it a breeze to get digital menu boards up on your TV screens in just a few seconds. Engage your customers with photos and videos of your specials to cross-sell and upsell menu items. Drag & drop media files into our app or use our free, professionally designed menu board layout templates. They're fully customizable so you can incorporate your own branding. Manage screens across locations remotely. With Yodeck, you get easy to use, professional digital signage at an unbeatable price.

similar_products.short_desc:
Our mission is to keep local thriving! 

We empower local pizzerias with the ordering, tech, and marketing tools of the big chains.
similar_products.features:
Grow Business. Gain Regulars.

Join the 18,000+ pizzerias nationwide that are already part of the Slice family. 

Slice is a system that focuses on online ordering and automated marketing creating loyal customers to grow your business - Slice's partners see up to 50% more repeat customers.

similar_products.short_desc: The Next-Gen Restaurant POS System: Easier, Faster, Modern
similar_products.features: NO SOFTWARE FEES FOR THE FIRST TWO TERMINALS. All Included for free: Online ordering, Inventory control, theft mitigation, EMV compliant Bar Tabs, advanced check splitting, QR Code ordering and Payments, delivery management, advanced pizza functionality, couponing, tableside ordering, rewards program, automated happy hour, customizable reports, built in drink recipes & more! Nobody beats Rezku's value. IF YOU HAVE MORE THAN TWO TERMINALS USE UNLIMITED TERMINALS FOR JUST $99/MONTH.

similar_products.short_desc: Operandio is an operations & digital checklist platform that helps business owners and managers raise the standard of their workforce.
similar_products.features:
Operandio is an operations and digital checklist platform that helps business owners and managers achieve staff accountability, safety, compliance and consistent business processes across multiple locations.

Raise the standard of your workforce with Operandio:

- Recurring tasks, checklists and procedures accessible via mobile or shared tablet apps
- Business knowledge and training, searchable and accessible to your entire workforce
- Powerful workforce messaging and communication
- Reporting

Cloud based Restaurant inventory management software and app.  MarketMan gives you the tools you need to manage your inventory, suppliers, orders, and menu costing.  Get accurate food cost and know where your money is going in real time.  Set alerts when menu items become less profitable and get notifications when supplier prices fluctuate.  The result is better control and more profits.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Catering software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Catering tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Catering software manages business functions for the catering, event planning, and banquet management industries. Catering software provides an integrated solution for coordinating essential business processes including client details, locations, scheduling, inventory management, menu planning, waitstaff coordination, and payroll, as well as marketing and budgeting functions. Catering tools can include document management functionality to help track proposals, deposits, contracts, and client histories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Food Costing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Food Costing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Food Costing Software allows restaurants to easily calculate food costs for their recipes, in order to ensure profitable menu pricing.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Food Service Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Food Service Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Food Service Management software enables inventory control, purchasing, receiving and recipe management for both public and private food service operations. Organizations use these applications to manage their back office functions as well as their customer relationship and accounting needs. Food Service Management software helps to control costs, monitor inventory, and automate labor intensive tasks. Food Service Management software is related to Catering software, Food Service Distribution software and Restaurant Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nutrition Analysis software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nutrition Analysis tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nutrition Analysis software can be used in food service and food manufacturing industries to calculate nutritional values for menu items and recipes, generate nutrition and ingredient labels, and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Restaurant POS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Restaurant POS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Restaurant POS software offers point of sale solutions specifically for the restaurant and bar industries. This type of software provides ordering, billing, reporting, accounting, table tracking, and receipt printing capabilities for restaurants and bars. Hardware such as computers, monitors and printers is often included in the purchase of POS systems. Restaurant POS software is related to POS software and Restaurant Management software.
